column2: I've heard good things and I've heard ok things about this place. Today was my first time at BaBaReeba and I must say overall the food is pretty good. I've tried the spicy potatoes with tomato alioli which were delicious! Beef tenderloins & blue cheese were very good as well
column4: cooked perfectly. I wasn't a fan of the grilled squid though
column5: it was rather rubbery. Chicken & ham croquetas were just ok
column6: there was just nothing special about them. Their sangrias are supposed to be the bomb? I felt like ours was a little watered down..
